summary: This document appears to be a set of resolutions related to the management and operation of Zorro Management, a limited liability company. It outlines the authority granted to certain individuals, including Jeffrey Epstein, to manage accounts and conduct transactions on behalf of the company, as well as the responsibilities and indemnifications associated with these actions.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is listed as an authorized signer for Zorro Management, indicating his role in managing the company's financial accounts.

persons.name: Darren Indyks
persons.context: Darren Indyks is also mentioned as an authorized signer for Zorro Management, alongside Jeffrey Epstein.

connections.description: Both Epstein and Indyks are authorized signers for Zorro Management, indicating a professional relationship in managing the company's accounts.

keyFacts: The document contains resolutions authorizing Jeffrey Epstein and Darren Indyks to manage financial accounts for Zorro Management.
It specifies that the company is bound by the terms of the agreements related to the accounts.
The document includes indemnification clauses protecting the bank from claims related to actions taken by the authorized signers.
